description: This file defines the navigation graph and routes for an Android TV application using Jetpack Compose. It sets up the main navigation structure with a persistent sidebar menu and multiple composable screens such as Home, Live TV Guide, Search, Video Detail, and Player screens, along with route management.

classes.name: Routes
classes.description: Object holding string constants for named navigation routes used throughout the app.

methods.name: TVNavGraph
methods.description: Main composable function that sets up the navigation controller and includes the Titanic Scaffold layout containing navigation drawer and nav host.

methods.name: TVScaffold
methods.description: Private composable that provides persistent left navigation panel and the main content area with navigation host.

methods.name: NavButton
methods.description: A composable button used in the navigation sidebar to switch between screens.
